# Aloha Media Studio

> Professional podcast production and media services in Eagle, Idaho. We help business owners launch and grow their podcasts with full-service production—from planning to publishing.

Aloha Media Studio is a full-service media production company specializing in podcast production for business professionals. We handle everything: content strategy, multi-camera recording in our professional studio, post-production editing, and distribution to all major platforms. Part of the Aloha Publishing family.

## Services

- [Podcast Production](https://alohamediastudio.com/): Full-service podcast launch and production packages
- [All Services](https://alohamediastudio.com/full-studio/): Video, photography, branding, and audio services
- [Studio Rental](https://alohamediastudio.com/studio/): Book our Eagle, Idaho production studio

## Key Information

- **Location:** Eagle, Idaho
- **Specialty:** Podcast production for business owners
- **Studio:** Professional multi-camera setup with lighting and audio
- **Process:** Plan → Record → Edit → Publish (we handle everything)
